Link to your Public Group Chat
Have you participated in a previous Gitcoin Grants Round? If so, please name the rounds or link the builder profile associated with previous rounds.

answers.answer:
YouBuidl is a decentralized social platform tailored for Web3 developers, builders, and contributors. Our key contributions to the open-source ecosystem (OSS) include:

üöÄ A Decentralized Social Feed for Builders
	‚Ä¢	The social feed allows builders, developers, and project creators to share their work, insights, and updates with a Web3-native audience.
	‚Ä¢	Unlike traditional platforms, YouBuidl ensures decentralized data ownership using Ceramic & Orbis Protocol, allowing contributors to fully control their content.

üí∞ Onchain Donations for Projects & Posts
	‚Ä¢	Users can donate directly to posts or projects via the feed, allowing builders to receive funding seamlessly.
	‚Ä¢	Donations are processed onchain, ensuring low-cost transactions and transparency in funding distribution.

üåç Open & Interactive Content via HTML/Iframe Embedding
	‚Ä¢	Developers can embed live project previews, dApp integrations, analytics dashboards, and interactive content directly within the feed.
	‚Ä¢	This feature makes it easier for the community to test, review, and support projects without leaving the platform.

üèÜ Points & Reputation System for Contribution
	‚Ä¢	Users accumulate points based on engagement, contributions, and donations received on their posts.
	‚Ä¢	Points act as a reputation metric, helping highlight impactful builders and contributors.
	‚Ä¢	This can be integrated into governance, incentives, or future reward mechanisms.

Through these mechanisms, YouBuidl creates an open-source hub where Web3 developers can gain visibility, receive financial support, and interact with the community without centralized control.
answers.question: How does your project contribute to the growth of the OSS ecosystem? Please provide specific examples of how your application enhances or expands the current ecosystem.

answers.answer:
YouBuidl is not just another social platform‚Äîit‚Äôs a decentralized ecosystem for Web3 builders.

üîπ Core Differentiators:

‚úÖ Decentralized Social Feed ‚Äì A builder-focused content hub, leveraging Orbis Protocol for censorship-resistant discussions.
‚úÖ Onchain Donations for Posts & Projects ‚Äì Users can directly support projects or builders.
‚úÖ Interactive Content via Iframe Embedding ‚Äì Enables live project previews and third-party integrations directly in the feed.
‚úÖ Points & Reputation System ‚Äì Recognizing and rewarding valuable contributors based on community engagement.

These features make YouBuidl a Web3-native alternative to traditional platforms, ensuring decentralized content ownership, funding opportunities, and an interactive knowledge-sharing environment.
answers.question: What features or use cases does your dApp/App present? How is it differentiated?

answers.answer:
We plan to enhance YouBuidl‚Äôs core functionalities and expand its impact within the Web3 ecosystem.

üöÄ Key Areas for Development:

üîπ Optimizing Onchain Donations ‚Äì Enhancing project-based funding pools and recurring funding models for builders.
üîπ Scaling the Points System ‚Äì Introducing reputation tiers, potential governance use cases, and reward mechanisms.
üîπ Expanding Iframe & HTML Embedding ‚Äì Allowing onchain games and richer third-party integrations for better interactive content.
üîπ Web3 Job & Collaboration Hub ‚Äì A marketplace where projects can connect with developers & contributors.
üîπ Improved UX & Mobile Accessibility ‚Äì Enhancing responsiveness and UI/UX for wider adoption.

With Gitcoin Grants, we aim to make YouBuidl the leading decentralized hub for Web3 networking, funding, and knowledge-sharing.
answers.question: What are your plans for further development, and how will the grant funds be used to achieve these goals?

For any project deploying smart contracts on blockchain networks, please list all your deployer addresses and their corresponding blockchain networks. Use this format for each entry: [deployer_address], [chain_id]‚Äîfor example, 0x123abc..., 42161 (This represents a deployer address on the Arbitrum network). Please include a separate line for each unique deployer address and blockchain combination.

project.title: GiveStation
project.description:
What is GiveStation?

GiveStation is a multi-chain give-to-earn grant protocol that rewards users for funding projects, ideas and public goods in web3. 


Our products:
1 . youbuidl (youbuidl.dev)
2. Givestation Name Service (GNS) - (https://you-v2.vercel.app/mintdomain)
3. Public Goods Store (https://you-v2.vercel.app/store)

The goal is to incentivize the web3 ecosystem by integrating token rewards for users who contributes to projects on each of this blockchain protocols.

Here are our official links                                                                                                                                                                  GiveStation Website and Governance 
Homepage - https://givestation.org/
DApp - https://youbuidl.dev/
Snapshot - https://snapshot.org/#/givestation.eth

Media & Community
https://discord.io/GiveStation
https://medium.com/GiveStation
https://twitter.com/GiveStation

GIVnaut NFT (Givestation Governance NFT)
Quix Marketplace - https://qx.app/collection/givestation-givnaut
Tofu Marketplace - https://tofunft.com/collection/givnaut-by-givestation/items

Github 
http://github.com/Givestation
https://github.com/givestation/youbuidl-quadraticfunding
https://github.com/MrBloomguy/youv2

Listings
https://www.alchemy.com/dapps/Givestation
https://gitcoin.co/grants/1599/givestation
